title: Temperatures plunge overnight as week-long cold snap hits UK
text:

author: 作者： 问舟
title: 腾讯《剑灵 2》今日正式上线：支持移动设备和 PC 跨平台游戏，最低要求 GTX 1060、苹果 iPhone 8 Plus 及以上
text:
IT之家 4 月 3 日消息，腾讯游戏《剑灵 2》将于 2025 年 4 月 3 日早 8:00 全平台正式上线，玩家可以通过游戏官网、WeGame，体积约 24.8GB。
手机玩家可通过 QQ、微信或移动应用商店进行下载，iOS 版包体 1.2GB，安装后还需下载约 7GB 的资源更新包。
IT之家附配置要求：
安卓端推荐配置：骁龙 865、麒麟 9000、天玑 8200，Android 10.0 以上、内存 12GB 以上。
iOS 端最低配置：
iPhone8 Plus 及以上型号，iPAD 搭载 A12 及以上型号处理器iOS 端推荐配置：iPhone 13 及以上型号，搭载 A15 及以上型号处理器的
iPadPC 端最低配置：酷睿 i5，8G，GTX 1060（4G），
Win10，DX11，1280*720PC 端推荐配置：酷睿 i7，16G，RTX 2060（4G），Win10，DX11，1920*1080
这款游戏已于去年 12 月获得版号，国服将由小明太极与腾讯游戏联合运营，支持移动设备和 PC 跨平台游戏。
据官方介绍，《剑灵 2》职业跟随武器变化，切换武器即可切换职业。游戏中目前版本有剑士、拳套、短刀、弓箭、斧、彩绫、玄铃等七种武器可选择，选择不同武器，即可选择职业。
游戏采用经典 MMO 交易体系，通过游戏内各类玩法均可获得可流通交易的装备、材料等。官方称保证每个版本的最强极品装备唯一的产出途径均通过游戏内玩法产出。
①自由交易：装备、材料可通过玩法掉落并流通。
②跨服交易所：全服互通，市场广阔，稳定经济体系。
③官方承诺：官方绝不干扰，坚决不在游戏中售卖装备。
充值方面，游戏提供了 18 元的“水月祝福”或 30 元的“海月祝福”月卡，每日领取绑定神石，每月 10 倍返利。
广告声明：文内含有的对外跳转链接（包括不限于超链接、二维码、口令等形式），用于传递更多信息，节省甄选时间，结果仅供参考，IT之家所有文章均包含本声明。
topics: Science and Technology->information technology and computer science

author: Evelyn Blackwell
title: EU SMEs Well Behind On Digitalisation, Eurostat Report Finds - WorldNewsEra
text: [Europe](../) EU SMEs well behind on digitalisation, Eurostat report finds Only 58% of EU small and medium enterprises have reached a basic level of digital services, an enormous 32 percentage points behind the goal set by the EU Commission for 2030. European businesses are struggling to evolve from a digital point of view. Only 58% of small and medium enterprises –[ which make up the vast majority of businesses in the EU ](//www.euronews.com/my-europe/2024/10/30/in-which-eu-countries-are-the-most-businesses-being-launched)– have reached a basic level of digital services, Eurostat reports. That is a long way from [the goal of 90% by 2030](//commission.europa.eu/strategy-and-policy/priorities-2019-2024/europe-fit-digital-age/europes-digital-decade-digital-targets-2030_en), which was set by the EU. Large enterprises, meaning those with at least 250 employees, fare much better: 91% have reached a basic level of digitalisation. In general, the countries with the most businesses on a “very low level of digital intensity” are Romania (72.1%), Bulgaria (70.6%) and Greece (56.2%). On the opposite side of the spectrum (very high level of digital intensity) are Finland (13.0%), Malta (11.4%) the Netherlands (11.0%). What does ‘digital intensity’ mean? The Digital Intensity Index (DII) is an indicator used by the EU to establish a business’s level of digitalisation. Having a “basic level of digital intensity” means using at least four of 12 digital technologies – such as AI, social media, cloud computing, and Customer Relationship Management – or having e-commerce sales accounting for at least 1% of total turnover. Video editor • Mert Can Yilmaz [World News](/)|| [Latest News](/news)|| [U.S. News](../../us-news) [Source link](//www.euronews.com/my-europe/2024/11/14/eu-smes-well-behind-on-digitalisation-eurostat-report-finds)

author: Annie Lane
title: Dear Annie: Overbearing in-laws - Thu, 15 Aug 2024 PST
text: Dear Annie: Overbearing in-laws Dear Annie: “John,” my 40-year-old fiance (only child) has boundary issues with his parents. They come over to his house approximately five days per week. The pretext is that they walk his dog. But here’s the thing: John works a cushy job from home. (Walk your own dog!) Here’s the other thing: they don’t just walk the dog. They load the dishwasher, vacuum, do yard work, write his grocery list, etc. They even go into his bedroom without asking to change the bedspread. They show up unannounced and walk right in like they own the place without ringing the doorbell. John’s parents are in their 70s. I told him that this is embarrassing and that he should be going over to THEIR house (10 minutes away) to help THEM with chores. I’ve brought up how it bothers me numerous times, and every time he shrugs it off like it’s no big deal and says that he doesn’t mind their help. I told him that it makes me feel like he can’t take care of himself and I’m worried if he can’t stand up to them now, he won’t in the future once we’re married either. Today I was over and said I would walk the dog instead, so he told his parents not to come over. Instead, his dad showed up insisting that he had thawed a bone for the dog and had to give it to her today. I told John: your parents don’t respect you or our relationship. They are treating you like a baby, and you are letting them. If they love you and want the best for you, they will back off if you tell them that their hovering is keeping you from moving forward in the next stage of your life. They won’t love you any less! He is a great guy and my best friend, but this is such a turn off and red flag in my opinion. Help! What should I do? – Help Dear Help: This almost sounds like a win-win; John’s parents get to see more of him, and you both get help with household chores. John may have an inability to stand up to his parents, as you say, but he also may just appreciate the help or enjoy having them pop in. The problem is they have no respect for your privacy. Explain to John that you appreciate his parents’ help, but they need to start ringing the doorbell, giving notice before they come over, staying out of your bedroom, etc. Together, you can explain these new ground rules to his parents, letting them know how much you value them but how necessary it is for newlyweds to have privacy and control over their home. Send your questions for Annie Lane to dearannie@creators.com.

title: Chapters of the AfD are considered right-wing "extremist" groups by Germany's domestic intelligence service. | National | purdueexponent.org

author: .com
title: Venerdì 13 dicembre con il maltempo ma la prossima settimana arriva l’anticiclone
text: (Adnkronos) – maltempo oggi sull'Italia con piogge e temporali a causa dell'arrivo di un’intensa perturbazione in questo Venerdì 13 dicembre e aumenta la parascevedecatriafobia: la paura del Venerdì 13. Il nome deriva da parasceve (dal greco paraskeu? ‘preparazione’, negli usi preparazione al sabato, quindi Venerdì) + decatriafobia paura del numero 13.
